page.title: 13HEALTH IN EPSOM
page.content: {In Epsom there is a large District {Hospital}with 22 wards, 498 beds, 123 medical staff, 450 patients, and 1531 weekly outpatients. It deals with 80 emergencies, and performs about 144 operations in the 4 theatres every week. There is also a maternity unit here and there are about 33 births per week. {The Cottage Hospital}is where patients are treated by GPs because they're not fit enough to be treated at home. There are 2 wards in which there are 35 beds. There are about 20 operations performed each week in the single theatre. There are only about 2 emergencies per week, and on average about 26 patients in the hospital at any one time.
